short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use LaTeX (a method for rendering mathematical formulas) with Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Typeset math in the outgoing and incoming messages. The other person does not have to have TeX for Gmail installed or to use Gmail. Math is viewable in most mail readers and browsers, including mobile ones.
